title: Pie Maker Cauliflower, Cheese and Bacon Fritters
directions: Place florets in food processor and blitz until like cauliflower rice (I used the Kmart 2 in 1 chopper). Transfer to large bowl
Add garlic, onion flakes, zucchini, bacon, cheese and flour, and mix well to combine
Beat eggs with a fork in a small bowl, season with salt and pepper. Add eggs along with 1/4 cup of water to the cauliflower mix and stir.
Gradually add remaining water (or add more or less) to achieve a thick batter
Heat up pie maker as per instructions (I used the Kmart pie maker)
Drop approx 1/4 cup of mixture into holes, close lid and cook for approx 5 minutes. Open lid, flip fritters pover, then close lid and cook a further 5 minutes
Remove from pie maker and let rest on plate with paper towel
Made approx 16 "fritters" (I lost count after I ate the first few)
ingredients: 2/3 cup cheese, grated (tasty, parmesan, or mixture)
1 garlic clove, crushed (or 1/2 tsp granulated garlic)
1 pinch salt & pepper, or to taste
